snippet.title: no scroll on Dell Latitude D820 touchpad
snippet.description: Installed windows 7 beta, 64-bit, yesterday, and everything went very smoothly. No problems. However, I can't scroll on the touchpad like I did with Vista, i.e., using one finger on the right portion of the touchpad.
